replies.body:
Clearly Taric,
the gem gives it away{{champion:44}}

**I'M BRONZE 5 AND I APPROVE !**

so does {{champion:201}}

Problem is most of the time I get pooled with weak players so it is very had for me to break out from Bronze. Sometimes I give up trying to play good and end up passing negative comments telling ppl how bad they are which eventually I get penalized for. Its such a vicious cycle. If only there was a way out.
The way out is to handle your emotions and not let them out on your team mates ever. Only then will you see success.

Sometimes that's so hard to do especially so when you know that you and a few members are struggling hard to win and then there are these others trolling and can't seem to work together... omg makes us wonder why we always seem to be in the losing team.

Anyway, will try my best to control my emotions...lol
especially when they troll

As a plat II/I, my personal motto is that if you're losing games consistently, you're not carrying hard enough.
If you need help ranking up next season I recommend "LoLCoaching" you can go search it up or click here:
http://www.lol-coaching.com/coaches.php , if you trust me{{champion:103}}  GL HF ranking up peeps!

lol.. Dunno what change that will bring but I hope another game comes up that is free like LOL - I'll leave this in a heartbeat. It just seems that when someone becomes a Bronze (maybe due to not playing rank in a while - not skill related) we are stuck in Bronze forever.

Well, the only reason why people are stuck in bronze is either they're too god damn stubborn to learn how to play better, or they just aren't ready to play in a higher division. To be honest, if you can't deal with trolls or flammers, then other high divisions won't be any better for you. lol.
Wait when is the end of the season? (day)
Tonight (Wednesday morning for AEDT) at 12am AEDT or 11pm AEST or 9pm Perth time.
well its another 7:30 hours before I can play ranked otherwise I will go back to bronze.

November 11, 00:01 (12:01AM)

Midnight.
> **At midnight AEDT (2AM NZDT) on November 11, ranked queues will come down for about twelve hours and we'll start _doling_ out rewards.** What? Is doling a word? Or were you meant to say rolling?
Doling is indeed a word.
Ah right, thanks for that
can anyone tell me can i still playing rank to diamond and get the diamond tier?   cuz since the solo rank still working .
Waiting for the moment I get challenger border {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:21}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:14}} {{champion:63}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3089}}

Is there still a way for me to get gold if I am in silver 1 promos and the season has ended? I have worked so hard at winning games and always try to carry each one for a measly 15 lp. Then I get games where someone afks and I lose 25 :/

yo it says you don't get season rewards for chat or in game restrictions does leaver buster come under these rules I recently started to get a lot of bugsplats and I messaged riot about these issues and ive been on a few leaver busters I hope because of a stupid bugsplat I don't lose out on my rewards I connect as soon as I can prob about 5mins after I bugsplat but hope I don't get punished for the silly bugsplats anyone any ideas?
question, if I'm in silver promos at the end of the season is it automatically completed? please say yes
can you plz extend the closing, its 11pm in qld, so close. bronze 1 99 lp :(

BUT IM ON 99LP TO SILVER 5 AND ALL I NEED IS A DAY
rito pls {{item:3070}}
{{champion:81}} ez gg im bronze for life
There should be a new years skin for pantheon {{champion:80}}
Hey Rito, When does the next season start??
is it 5:00AM AEST or 0:01 AEST?http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce

Everyone commenting "Bronze is so hard to get out of" Pssssssh it really isn't.. if you have more deaths then kills at the end of your game every game then most likely you're bad. "But my teams are sooo bad" Yeah and so are you.
ez pz
Man my smurf is silver 1, doubt there is enough time
There's always enough time.

i wish OCE had a longer season, because we didn't have 24 hour ranked ques for the full season and we also do not have ranked 3's twisted treeline yet either, much easier to find 3 friends to play with than 5. the oce server is highly disadvantaged :(
well if you had friends you wouldn't be disadvantaged, must be hard being lonely
dammit ill never reach silver now {{item:3070}}
Hue...
{{champion:11}} LOL
{{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}}  lol
